HORSETAMER.description: It's a real horse I ride

TOXICOLOGIST.description: Make them taste their own medicine

JOCKEY.description: Spawn a friend, to fight a foe!

RANDOM.description: Gives a random kit for bonus coins!

RAMBO.description: A stick, no armor pickup, good luck.

taunts.__desc: If cost is 0 then the taunt can't be bought.

DEFAULT.description: Returns your taunt to the default taunt. Nothing fancy.

I_REFUSE.description: While taunting, you will be grumpy.

CHICKEN_DANCE.description: While taunting, two chickens fly around you while you cluck like a chicken.

PIG_DANCE.description: While taunting, two pigs walk around you while you squeal like a pig.

SHEEP_PARADE.description: While taunting, 3 randomly colored sheep walk around you while you bleat like a sheep.

BAT_DUDE.description: While taunting, four noisy bats fly around your head.

WOLF_PACK.description: While taunting, two wolves sit by your side while you howl like a wolf.

VILLAGER_MUSIC_BAND.description: While taunting, 4 Villagers panic around you, attempting to make music.

RICH_JAMES.description: While taunting, you flaunt your greed by showing off your diamonds.

COOKIE.description: While taunting, you throw up some still-edible cookies.

DEFAULT.description: Returns your taunt to the default victory dance. Removes everything.

DRAGON_RIDER.description: If you win, celebrate by riding a Dragon capable of destroying the map.

PLAYER_FIREWORK.description: If you win, celebrate by having your very own fireworks show with your name in the sky!

EARTH.description: After a victory, an earth appears above you. "Today Blitz and tomorrow the world!"

CREEPER.description: If you win, celebrate by having creepers explode around you!

BLAZING_SPEED.description: If you win, celebrate by running around the map with extreme speed, leaving a trail of fire behind you.

METEOR_SHOWER.description: If you win, celebrate by calling down a destructive meteor shower.

DEFAULT.description: This is the default finisher. Nothing happens.

EXPLOSIONS.description: Show your dominance by nuking the place.

LIGHTNING_STRIKE.description: Strike even more lightning on your victim.

CREEPER_FIREWORK.description: Launch a creeper firework where your victim stood.

INFESTATION.description: Silverfish jump out of your victim's body and eat its remains

GRAVESTONE.description: Pay your respects to your victims with a sweet gravestone.

SQUID_MISSILE.description: Launches a squid missile straight to the moon.

REKT_HOLOGRAM.description: Spawn a hologram in the air with #rekt written on it. Much salt.

ASSASSIN.description: Teleport to the nearest player and remove half their health.

VAMPIRE.description: Heal for half of all damage you do to players.

JEDI_KNIGHT.description: Ridiculously push back a player facing you.

IMPRISON.description: No players can move except you for 15s.

VAULTHUNTER.description: Spawn an incredible chest only for 8 seconds.

WITHERWARRIOR.description: Every hit for 20 seconds after activation applies Wither III for 3 seconds.

GREMLIN.description: Clears the inventory and armor of the person with the most kills.

ROULETTE.description: Kill a random player, might be you!

INVOKER.description: Gives you three random powerful incantations.

WOBBUFFET.description: Reflects all damage onto your attacker for 30 seconds, while Iron Man is active gain Fire Resistance, Resistance and Weakness I.

NUKE.description: Gives you a laser visor to drop a tactical nuke.

NINJA.description: Silently go invisible for 2 minutes and gain incredible speed, your first hit while invisible makes you visible, reduces your speed and blinds the target for 3 seconds.

ROBINHOOD.description: Instakill the first player your arrow hits within 30s.

SUPPLIES.description: Gives you one of three rare items randomly.

SHOTGUN.description: Gives you a shotgun with 6 pellets.

LOCKDOWN.description: All chests, enchantment tables and crafting tables are being locked and cannot be opened anymore.

TIME_WARP.description: Brings you back to where you were 10 seconds ago, heals 10 hearts.

ACID_RAIN.description: It starts to rain for 30s and damages your enemies if they don't find cover.

INFECTION.description: Your bare fists have the ability to apply poison and slowness to your enemies.

PICKPOCKET.description: Gives a chance of disarming an enemy on hit.

LUCKY_CHARM.description: You start earning experience over time!

RAGNAROK.description: For the rest of the game all players have only 5 hearts!
